mimic.title: LSB Steganography Lab
mimic.description: Hide encrypted payloads inside innocuous images.
mimic.warningText: Uses LSB (Least Significant Bit) Steganography. Output images must be saved as PNG. Cloud compression (FB, Twitter, WhatsApp default) will destroy data.
mimic.encryptionComplete: Encryption complete. Please download the PNG.
mimic.dataFound: Data found! Switch to Vault to decrypt.
mimic.noDataFound: No valid data found or error reading image.
mimic.enterPayload: Enter text to hide in image...
mimic.payloadReady: PAYLOAD READY :: WAITING FOR CARRIER IMAGE
mimic.enterEmbedText: Please enter some text to embed first.

settings.title: System Configuration
settings.panicModePinDesc: Require PIN to exit camouflage mode
settings.emergencyWipeDesc: Destroy all local keys and cache immediately

tutorial.welcomeDesc: Your ultimate tool for secure communication and digital camouflage. Let's get you started!
tutorial.rsaAesDesc: Toggle between modes in the Crypt panel to suit your needs.
tutorial.rsaAesTip: üí° Pro Tip: Use AES (Symmetric) for your own files. Use RSA (Asymmetric) to send secrets to friends.
tutorial.rsaStep1Desc: First, go to the ID panel and generate your Identity Card. This allows others to send you secure messages.
tutorial.rsaStep2Desc: Send your card file to a friend. When they send you theirs, click 'Import Card'. They will appear in your contacts.
tutorial.rsaStep3Desc: In the Crypt panel, select 'Asymmetric (RSA)'. Pick your friend from the list. Now, only *they* can decrypt the message.
tutorial.aesStep1Desc: Uses the same key for encryption and decryption. Ideal for personal files or quick sharing.
tutorial.aesStep2Desc: To read the message, the recipient must enter the exact same password.
tutorial.stegoDesc: Hide your encrypted data inside normal-looking images! Upload an image, embed your secrets, and share the PNG.

rsa.title: RSA: Public Channel
rsa.analogy: Think of it as a public drop-box for Operator reports. Any Operator can deposit a report (Public Key), but only the Doctor with the command clearance (Private Key) can unlock and read it.
rsa.tech: RSA relies on complex factorization algorithms, similar to decoding ancient Originium patterns. It is computationally heavy (slow Arts), so we use it primarily to securely exchange the tactical frequencies (AES keys).

aes.title: AES: Secure Frequency
aes.analogy: A direct, encrypted radio frequency between two Operators. You both must tune to the exact same frequency (Key). The challenge is sharing that frequency without Reunion intercepting it.
aes.tech: AES (Advanced Encryption Standard) scrambles data like a fast-cast Arts barrier. It is extremely efficient, perfect for transmitting large combat data logs once the secure link is established.

stego.title: LSB Camouflage
stego.analogy: We modulate the color values of an image so slightly that the naked eye sees nothing amiss. Like Manticore's invisibility, the data is hidden in plain sight, waiting for a scanner to reveal it.
stego.tech: We manipulate the Least Significant Bit of each pixel's Originium color value. Modifying a Red value from 255 to 254 is invisible to standard observation. Warning: Compression (like JPEG) disrupts this delicate Arts weave.
